cause.description:
SO MANY PPL KNOW WHAT IM TALKING ABOUT HERE DRUNK DRIVERS ARE IRRESPONSIBLE AND THEY SHOULD BE STOPPED! IF NOT FOR THEIR OWN GOOD THEN FOR OTHER PEOPLE...THOSE OF YOU WHO HAVE LOST SOMEONE YOU KNOW WHAT WERE TALKING ABOUT....ITS IMMORALLY WRONG!
1. DRUNK DRIVING IS WRONG
2. DRUNK DRIVING MUST BE STOPPED
3. DRUNK DRIVING RUINS PEOPLES LIVES
cause.name: ppl against drunk driving
